channel.title: Posts on Eduardo Alemán’s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eduardo Alemán’s Blog

item.title: Hardening an Ubuntu Server: Essential Steps
item.description: A practical guide to securing your Ubuntu server: from disabling root access to configuring ProxyJump and two-factor authentication.

item.title: Useful RPC Commands for a Nano Node
item.description: Overview of available actions through the JSON-RPC API on a self-hosted Nano node.

item.title: Resources in Spanish and English on Digital Humanities, Citizen Research, and Critical Editions
item.description: An expanded overview of key projects, platforms, and bibliographies in Spanish related to Digital Humanities, citizen science, collaborative history, digital archives, computational philology, and critical editions.
